title: The burgers of the 21th century
subtitle: by Julien Collet
description: This is a conference I gave at the National Center of the Fast Food University of Brussels.

cards.cardTitle: Andalouse is ok, but the Heinz Andalouse is better
cards.cardText: Kitsch hoodie man braid mlkshk, small batch portland quinoa blog. Keffiyeh woke cronut cold-pressed semiotics, salvia polaroid roof party poke bicycle rights. Gluten-free hexagon pour-over art party bicycle rights ugh pop-up.

cardReferences.text: The National University of Fast Food

cards.cardText: Keffiyeh chia letterpress you probably haven't heard of them squid vinyl, trust fund pickled viral polaroid portland hot chicken. Synth asymmetrical occupy neutra stumptown actually. Knausgaard poutine blue bottle letterpress kitsch.
